entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Halifax
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:42 PM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -3.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Halifax Stanfield Int'l Airport 3:00 PM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -3.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.7 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 60 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -10.5°C
Wind: NW 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of rain mixed with snow. Low minus 2 with temperature rising to plus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of rain mixed with snow beginning overnight. Fog patches overnight. Rainfall amount 2 mm. Wind becoming southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 overnight. Low minus 2 with temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain at times heavy. High 10.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Amount 40 to 50 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 70 gusting to 100 late in the morning. High 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Rain ending early in the evening then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023
